_intro:
**Khanate Platoons:**

> The Copper Khanate Contingent is organized into seven active platoons based on any given member's preferred combat style.
> Members are permitted to be in a maximum of three different platoons simultaneously with the exception of Platoon Officers
> and Platoon Instructors. Joining a platoon is entirely optional and the decision can be made at any time.
> 
> The primary purpose behind said platoons are for new players to better learn chosen skills and allow for members to better
> distinguish themselves.

**The Khanate's platoons in order are:**
Platoon I.   M.E.T.H.
Platoon II.  C.A.L.I.B.R.E.
Platoon III. [ LOST ] M.I.A.
Platoon IV.  S.T.A.L.K.E.R.
Platoon V.   [ LOST ] K.I.A.
Platoon VI.  [ LOST ] K.I.A.
Platoon VII. D.I.E.S.E.L.
Platoon VIII. S.T.A.T.I.C.
Platoon IX.  [ LOST ] M.I.A.
Platoon X.   R.E.T.I.C.L.E.
Platoon XI.  [ LOST ] REDACTED
Platoon XII. [ LOST ] K.I.A.
Platoon XIII. G.E.N.E.V.A.
Platoon XIV. [ LOST ] K.I.A.
Platoon XV.  [ LOST ] K.I.A.
